creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Actor's(?) robe of red and blue embroidered satin with many hanging tabs, double collar, and long wide sleeves with wavy colored satin bands around lower arm section. Silvered bosses stud robe. Embroidery chiefly satin and couched stitch. Fringed front and back panels. Lining of thin diapered silk in strong pink.
title: Bride's Robe
